actions.removePrompt: Are you sure you want to remove {{title}}?

list.stats_empty: You have no titles in your list
list.stats: You have {{count, bold}} title in your list
list.stats_plural: You have {{count, bold}} titles in your list
list.title_empty: There are no titles in your list expiring soon!
list.title: The following title in your list is expiring soon:
list.title_plural: The following {{count}} titles in your list are expiring soon:
list.error: There was an error fetching your list. Please try again.

choose.title: Download your Netflix activity
choose.text: You can download your complete viewing activity and rating history in JSON format. Please be aware the download may take a few seconds.

done.title: Done!
done.text: If you missed the Save window, you can save the file again with '$t(modals.buttons.save)'.
